name: Slender - New Hope
description:
Slender - New Hope

Slender - New Hope is based on Slender: The Eight Pages, but with modern graphic, better AI, bigger forest, local and online multiplayer & a scary environment.

This game is currently in a Pre-Alpha state! Iam working alone on this project and it would help me a lot if you report bugs and provide me with your feedback.

Controls:

  • Move: W,A,S,D
  • Interact: Left click
  • Flashlight: Right click
  • Run: Shift
  • Menu: Escape

Currently available features:

  • Singleplayer-Mode

Features in comming updates:

  • Local Co-Op
  • Online multiplayer

Cheats:

  • Disable slenderman: [1]
  • Hide/show grass and trees: [3]/[4]

Do you want to explore the unfinished map & try to find all 8 pages? Then start singleplayer-mode and press [b] ;)

BOOST FPS:

  1. Set graphic to high (or lower)
  2. Turn off shadows
  3. Set SSR to low

Iam trying to optimize the game soon!
